item.title: [EU/CA][Baremetal] - Failing OS installations - Product Baremetal
item.description:
Oct 18, 17:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/10/2022 16:04 UTC
End Time : 18/10/2022 16:57 UTC
Impacted service : Due to a database slowdown, you may have encountered a "Managing Admin password failed" error message during OS installation on Baremetal servers.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational but failing installations must be manually restarted.
